constituent: strangle, thread, spiderman, mingle, top hat, father
koohiiStory1: Spiderman hates going to parties and having to mingle. He wants to strangle someone after just a little small talk.
koohiiStory2: At the elegant cocktail party of VIP's, the spy, dressed like everyone else in formal evening wear, sneaks in and strangles his victim with a very thin wire - a thread. Afterwards he mingles in with the crowd and disappears.
readingExamples: 絞まる (し.まる), 絞める (し.める), 絞る (しぼ.る)
words: 絞る(しぼる): press, wring, squeeze
